SELECT m.member_name ,m.member_level_title ,m.department_category_name ,m.department_division_name ,m.department_section_name ,m.member_position_name ,m.member_id ,m.member_phone ,m.member_mobile ,m.member_join_day ,m.member_address FROM department d INNER JOIN member m
ON d.department_name = m.department_division_name
ON d.department_name = m.department_section_name
ON d.department_name = m.department_category_name
WHERE d.department_name = #{departmentName}
